participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, Jessica enjoys spending time with her pets and values her independence.
participant_1.background: My pets are a good way to keep my mind off of my divorce. My job allows me to be myself and be creative. I work part time. I'm glad that I have enough free time to read again now that my children are grown. I've worked at my current job for two years, and I still hate popcorn.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and imaginative, Ryan loves nature and is passionate about creative expression.
participant_2.background: I wish I could share my love of nature with my girlfriend. I am a creative person who loves to make my nails look their best. I wonder about what life in space would be like. I enjoy coffee to help me focus on my work and family. I'm interested in solving complex problems and making my country a better place.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Pretty good, just got back from taking my dogs for a walk.
Aw, I love dogs. What kind do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a corgi mix.
Oh, that sounds adorable! I've always wanted a corgi.
What do you do for work?
I'm a part-time artist. I work as a barista to support my art.
That's really cool! I love art. I'm a creative person too. I love doing my nails and making them look nice.
Nice! I wish I had the patience to do my own nails.
It's not that hard, just takes some practice!
I'm really interested in solving complex problems. I also like to think about what life in space would be like.
That's really interesting! I've never really thought about what life in space would be like.
It's really interesting to think about.
